```py
def summarize(sent_scores, k):
    top_sents = Counter(sent_scores) 
    summary = ''
    scores = []

    top = top_sents.most_common(k)
    for t in top: 
        summary += t[0].strip()+'. '
        scores.append((t[1], t[0]))
    return summary[:-1], scores
```
